text: Checking for an engine malfunction… All general and auxiliary systems are okay. Scanning for… Oh. Captain, we’re not in the Orcan Archipelago anymore.
I think we can logically presume that we have been… teleported.
Captain! Someone… or something… is trying to hail us. What should we do?
...Go ahead, put them through. This is Captain Tanyo, commanding officer of the Narwhal. We are stranded and mean no harm. State your intentions.
